title: Classification of external zones for a recreational vehicle â€” external showers
fullText:
One zone (Zone 1) is classified for external showers. Zone 1 shall be the area 0.6 m each side of the fixed plumbing connection.
The requirements for selection and installation of electrical equipment in these zones are provided in Table 4.3.
The zone shall wrap around onto the adjacent surface of the recreational or non-recreational vehicle to a total linear distance of 0.6 m from the plumbing connection.
NOTE See Figures 4.9, 4.10 and 4.11 for external shower classified zones.
